item.description:
Mark your calendars for the day after Turkey Day. This is gonna be a great triple-bill.

Here's what they said at churchofboston.com

We can't wait for this one, and neither can you. I mean, after Thanksgiving and all the family stuff, you'll be screaming to get out and take a load off. Church is the place to be - and this show is going to be killer!

11:15 - Sarah Borges & The Broken Singles
10:00 - Girls Guns & Glory
9:00 - Mike Macdonald & The Widow Makers

[Click on the names above to sample their web pages]

$10 Cover
item.how_to_find_us: I will email my cell# to attendees
item.name: Sarah Borges, Girls Guns and Glory, Mike MacDonald
